alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 12 at 10:05PM CDT until April 18 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Minnesota... Snake River Near Snake at Pine City affecting Pine County. For the Snake River at Pine City...flooding is possible. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Snake River Near Snake at Pine City. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to late Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, This will cause flooding near Cross Lake near Pine City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 6.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 100 PM CDT.
